start.start2:
me to find out more about how to use me to my full potential : )

start.private:
Hi! My name is Susie, nice to meet you : )

I am a [Kleros Moderate](https://kleros.io/moderate) community manager at your service. Use /help to learn how to use me to my full potential.

Join @SusieSupport to get information on all the latest updates.

welcome.welcome:
Hi, I'm Susie, a [Kleros Moderate](https://kleros.io/moderate/) bot.

I need permission from an admin to /start.

How do I help with moderation?

1. I ask "Did a user break the rules?" on the crowdsourcing platform [Reality.Eth](https://realityeth.github.io/).
2. The question is answered with an escalation game using xDai on [Gnosis Chain](https://www.gnosis.io/).
3. The answer can be disputed in the [Kleros](https://kleros.io/) court.

To learn more, [DM](https://t.me/SusieTheKlerosModeratorBot?start=help) me, read my [docs](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/products/moderate/susie), or ask a question in @SusieSupport.

index.supergroup: Hi! I'm Susie, a moderation and group management bot. I can only manage supergroups. To promote this group to a supergroup, make the group public or promote any member to a full admin and try to /start me again.
index.topicError: Susie cannot manage groups in topic mode with out permission to manage topics. Please ask an admin to enable this permission to allow Susie to continue help moderating your community. Then try to /start.

help.help:
*Help*

Hi! My name is Susie. I'm a [Kleros Moderate](https://kleros.io/moderate) bot, here to help you manage your groups!

I crowdsource moderation using [Reality.eth](https://reality.eth.limo/) and [Kleros](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/) on [Gnosis Chain](https://www.gnosis.io/).

Moderation is resolved with an escalation game and the outcome can be disptued in the Kleros Court.

Helpful commands:
    - /start: Starts me.
    - /help: Sends this help message.

Select a feature to learn more. Ask questions in @SusieSupport or read the [docs](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/products/moderate/susie).
help.Greeting1:
üëã *Greeting* üëã

Welcome your members with a greeting informing them of the group rules.

After 5 minutes, the previous welcome message or captcha will get deleted

*Admin commands:*
- `/welcome` : Toggles on/off welcomes messages.
- `/captcha` : Toggles on/off captcha.
help.Language1:
üó£Ô∏è *Languages* üó£Ô∏è

Susie's replies can be changed to one of the languages below.

- EN (English)
- ES (Espa√±ol)

Content moderation requires a nuanced understanding of context and language. Please make sure to set the appropriate language for your community for effective moderation.

*Admin commands*:    
- `/lang`: Set your preferred language.
help.Topics1:
‚ÑπÔ∏è *Topics* ‚ÑπÔ∏è

Topics allow large groups to focus discussion in dedicated **topic** chats. Susie supports topics. When changing a group to topic mode, you will need to /start Susie again.

*Admin commands*:
- `/start`: Start topic mode.
help.Evidence1:
üîç *Evidence* üîç

To prevent important messages from deletion, pre-emptively, messages can be saved as evidence.

*User commands*:
- `/evidence` <by reply>: Saves message as evidence.
help.Report1:
üö® *Report* üö®

Reports create content moderation questions on the crowdsourcing platform Reality.Eth asking,

***Did the user break the rules?***

The question can be answered yes/no with a bond (1 xDAI). Answers can be disputed in the Kleros court.

Successful reports result in escalating penalties (1 day, 1 week, 1 year ban).

*User commands*:
- `/report` <by reply>: Reports message.
- `/info`: Returns active reports

*Admin commands*:
-`/adminreportable` Toggles reportability of admins.
- `/trial` Toggles trial mode where users are not penalized
help.Rules1:
üìÑ *Rules* üìÑ

Every groups starts with [default rules](https://ipfs.kleros.io/ipfs/Qme3Qbj9rKUNHUe9vj9rqCLnTVUCWKy2YfveQF8HiuWQSu/Kleros%20Moderate%20Community%20Rules.pdf).

***Rule Writing Tips***:

- State the group culture in a preamble.
- Number each rule.
- Be specific.

*User commands*:
- `/rules`: Returns current rules
*Admin commands*:
- `/setrules` <by reply> or <url>: Sets the rules to the url or message
help.Court1:
‚öñÔ∏è *Court* ‚öñÔ∏è

Moderation questions are resolved by the [Kleros Court](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/) with a jury of moderators. If the jury made a mistake, the case can be appealed, drawing a larger pool of jurors and providing an opportunity to provide more context, analysis, and arguments.

If you would like a chance to serve as a jury member, get PNK ([Gnosis Chain](https://swapr.eth.link/#/swap?chainId=100) or [Mainnet](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x93ed3fbe21207ec2e8f2d3c3de6e058cb73bc04d&inputCurrency=ETH)) and [stake](https://court.kleros.io/) in the Kleros court.

To discuss the merits of a dispute, see @klerosjuror. To learn more about Kleros, ask a question in @Kleros
help.Lawyer1:
üßë‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è *Find a Lawyer* üßë‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è

Disputes over content moderation questions can be complicated.

If you need help arguing your case in the Kleros court, consider asking help from a Kleros [lawyer](https://t.me/+9fvGGkGfSZ1hZDBk).
help.Privacy1:
üïµÔ∏è *Privacy* üïµÔ∏è

To provide context, users can request Susie to save messages to submit as evidence on their behalf. Susie manages moderation private and public groups differently,

- ***Private Groups***: Moderators depend on evidence submissions alone.

- ***Public Groups***: Moderators have access to the full public chat history.
help.Notifications1:
üîî *Notifications* üîî

Notifications can be sent to a separate channel to avoid cluttering the main group.

How to enable notification channels:

1. Make a channel
2. Add Susie
3. Susie will send a channel ID
4. Use that channel ID to set notifications with /setchannel in the original group

*User commands*:
- `/notifications`: Returns current notification channel
*Admin commands*:
- `/setchannel` <channelID>: Sets the notification channel to the specified channel id
- `/setfedchannel` <channelID>: Sets the notification channel for your federation to the specified channel id
help.Federations1:
üåê *Federations*

Moderating a single group is hard, but managing multiple is even harder. Do you have to ban spammers manually, in all your groups?

No more! With federations, Susie can enforce a ban on a user in all federated groups.

*User commands*:
- `/fedinfo`: Returns current federation
*Admin commands*:
- `/newfed`: Creates a federation
- `/joinfed`: Joins the current group to a Federation
help.Gnosis1:
‚õìÔ∏è *Gnosis Chain* ‚õìÔ∏è

Susie uses the stable coin xDai on [Gnosis Chain](https://www.gnosis.io/), a public ledger to coordinate moderation fairly and transparently.

Don't have any xDAI on Gnosis Chain? No problem, there's a [bridge](https://bridge.connext.network/?receivingChainId=100&receivingAssetId=0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000) for that. 

What's crypto? I don't want anything to do with crypto. No problem, you can ask for help from freelance moderators in @SusieSupport.

Don't have any cryptocurrency? No problem, there's a convenient [fiat on-ramp](https://www.mtpelerin.com/buy-xdai) (credit card or bank transfer) to buy xDai on Gnosis Chain.

Need help adding the Gnosis Chain network to your wallet? Don't worry, there's a [guide](https://docs.gnosischain.com/tools/wallets/metamask#2-configure) for that.

Need more help? Don't worry, there's a @SusieSupport group for that

index.supergroup: Hola, soy Susie, un bot de moderaci√≥n y gesti√≥n de grupos. S√≥lo puedo gestionar supergrupos. Para promover este grupo a un supergrupo, haz p√∫blico el grupo o promueve a cualquier miembro a administrador completo e intenta /start me de nuevo.

start.start1: Hola! Mis herramientas de moderaci√≥n comunitaria est√°n a tu servicio. Env√≠ame un [DM]
start.start2:
para saber m√°s sobre c√≥mo aprovechar todo mi potencial. : )

start.private:
Hola, me llamo Susie, encantada de conocerte : )

Soy una [Kleros Moderate](https://kleros.io/moderate) community manager a tu servicio. Utiliza /help para aprender a utilizarme en todo mi potencial.

√önete a mi canal de noticias @KlerosModerateNews para informarte de todas las √∫ltimas actualizaciones.

welcome.welcome:
Hola, soy Susie, un bot [Kleros Moderate](https://kleros.io/moderate/). Necesito permiso de un administrador para /start. ¬øC√≥mo puedo ayudar con la moderaci√≥n?

 1. Pregunto

'¬øUn usuario ha infringido las normas?'n

en la plataforma de crowdsourcing [Reality.Eth](https://realityeth.github.io/).
2. La pregunta se responde con un juego de escalada usando xDai en [Gnosis Chain](https://www.gnosis.io/).
3. La respuesta se puede disputar en el tribunal [Kleros](https://kleros.io/).

Para saber m√°s, [DM](https://t.me/SusieTheKlerosModeratorBot?start=help) m√≠o, lee mis [docs](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/products/moderate/susie), o haz una pregunta en @SusieSupport.

help.help:
*Ayuda*

¬°Hola! Me llamo Susie. Soy un bot [Kleros Moderate](https://kleros.io/moderate), ¬°aqu√≠ para ayudarte a gestionar tus grupos!

¬°Modero en grupo usando [Reality.eth](https://reality.eth.limo/) y [Kleros](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/) en [Gnosis Chain](https://www.gnosis.io/).

La moderaci√≥n se resuelve con un juego de escalada y el resultado se puede disputar en el Tribunal Kleros.

Comandos √∫tiles:
 - /start: Me inicia.
 - /help: Env√≠a este mensaje de ayuda.

Selecciona una funci√≥n para saber m√°s. Haz preguntas en @SusieSupport o lee los [docs](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/products/moderate/susie).
help.Greeting1:
üëã *Saludos* üëã Bienvenida a tus miembros con un saludo inform√°ndoles de las reglas del grupo. Despu√©s de 5 minutos, los mensajes de bienvenida o captcha anteriores se borrar√°n.

*Comandos de administrador:*
- `/welcome` : Activa / desactiva los mensajes de bienvenida.
- `/captcha` : Activa / desactiva las reglas captcha.
help.Language1:
üó£Ô∏è *Idiomas* üó£Ô∏è

Las respuestas de Susie pueden cambiarse a uno de los siguientes idiomas.

- EN (English)
- ES (Espa√±ol)

La moderaci√≥n de contenidos requiere una comprensi√≥n matizada del contexto y del lenguaje. Por favor, aseg√∫rese de establecer el idioma apropiado para su comunidad para una moderaci√≥n efectiva. 

*Comandos de administraci√≥n*:
`/lang`: Establezca su idioma preferido.
help.Topics1:
‚ÑπÔ∏è *Temas* ‚ÑπÔ∏è

Los temas permiten a los grandes grupos centrar el debate en chats dedicados a **temas**. Susie es compatible con los temas. Cuando cambie un grupo a modo de tema, necesitar√° /iniciar Susie de nuevo.

*Comandos de administrador*:
- `/start`: Inicia el modo por temas.
help.Evidence1:
üîç *Evidencia* üîç

Para evitar que se borren mensajes importantes, de forma preventiva, se pueden guardar mensajes como evidencia.

*Comandos de usuario*:
- `/evidence` <por respuesta>: Guarda el mensaje como evidencia.
help.Report1:
üö® *Informe* üö® 

Los informes crean preguntas de moderaci√≥n de contenidos en la plataforma de crowdsourcing Reality.Eth preguntando,

'¬øel usuario infringi√≥ las normas?'

La pregunta puede responderse s√≠/no con un bono (1 xDAI). Las respuestas pueden ser impugnadas en el tribunal Kleros.

Los informes exitosos resultan en sanciones escalonadas (1 d√≠a, 1 semana, 1 a√±o de prohibici√≥n).

*Comandos de usuario*:
- `/report` <por respuesta>: Informa del mensaje.
- `/info`: Devuelve los informes activos.n
*Comandos de administrador*:
-`/adminreportable` Activa la posibilidad de informar de los administradores.
- `/trial` Activa el modo de prueba en el que los usuarios no son penalizados.
help.Rules1:
üìÑ *Reglas* üìÑ

Todos los grupos empiezan con [reglas por defecto](https://ipfs.kleros.io/ipfs/QmSHAjfD1MYPtyopFoXcUQ5Ny3sfs5re1yz3h3TZ5qGDsp/Kleros%20Moderate%20Normas%20comunitarias.pdf). 

***Consejos para la redacci√≥n de reglas***:

 -Enuncie la cultura del grupo en un pre√°mbulo.
 -Numere cada regla.
Sea espec√≠fico.

*Comandos de usuario*:
-`/rules`: Devuelve las reglas.
*Comandos de administrador*:
- `/setrules` <by reply> o <url>: Establece las reglas a la url o mensaje.
help.Court1:
‚öñÔ∏è *Corte* ‚öñÔ∏è

Las preguntas de moderaci√≥n las resuelve el [Kleros Court](https://kleros.gitbook.io/docs/) con un jurado de moderadores. Si el jurado cometi√≥ un error, el caso puede ser apelado, atrayendo a un grupo m√°s grande de miembros del jurado y proporcionando la oportunidad de proporcionar m√°s contexto, an√°lisis y argumentos.

Si desea tener la oportunidad de servir como miembro del jurado, obtenga PNK ([Gnosis Chain](https://swapr.eth.link/#/swap?chainId=100) o [Mainnet](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x93ed3fbe21207ec2e8f2d3c3de6e058cb73bc04d&inputCurrency=ETH)) y [stake](https://court.kleros.io/) en el tribunal de Kleros.

Para discutir el fondo de una disputa, consulte @klerosjuror.
help.Lawyer1:

help.Notifications1:
üîî *Notificaciones* üîî

Las notificaciones pueden enviarse a un canal independiente para no saturar el grupo principal.

C√≥mo habilitar canales de notificaci√≥n:

1. Crea un canal
2. A√±ade a Susie
3. Susie enviar√° un ID de canal
4. Utiliza ese ID de canal para establecer notificaciones con /setchannel en el grupo original
